# couchbase-capella_app_endpoint_log_streaming_config (Resource)

Manages the Logging Config for an App Endpoint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_endpoint_name` (String) The name of the App Endpoint.
- `app_service_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the appService.
- `cluster_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the cluster.
- `log_keys` (List of String) - Filter logs to specific log keys
- `log_level` (String) - Filters logs based on specific log keys, such as HTTP, Import, Query, etc.
- `organization_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the organization.
- `project_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the project.
